name: TAM-AI-GOTCHI - A virtual AI pet
description:
Science Jam 2022 with Gothenburg Science festival.

By Johan Handin (Artist and Designer), Jonas Sandstedt (Programmer), Emelie Bergman (artist)

Tamagotchi inspired game where you take care of your own AI. Feed it with different kind of data and see what kind of AI it will evolve to. But take care of it, if there is too much unused data it could crash.
